00061 Master::Master(ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr, PropertiesPtr &props_ptr, ApplicationQueuePtr &app_queue) : m_props_ptr(props_ptr), m_conn_manager_ptr(conn_mgr), m_app_queue_ptr(app_queue), m_verbose(false), m_dfs_client(0), m_initialized(false) {
00062   int error;
00063   Client *dfs_client;
00064   uint16_t port;
00065 
00066   m_server_map_iter = m_server_map.begin();
00067 
00068   m_hyperspace_ptr = new Hyperspace::Session(conn_mgr->get_comm(), props_ptr, &m_hyperspace_session_handler);
00069 
00070   if (!m_hyperspace_ptr->wait_for_connection(30)) {
00071     HT_ERROR("Unable to connect to hyperspace, exiting...");
00072     exit(1);
00073   }
00074 
00075   m_verbose = props_ptr->get_bool("Hypertable.Verbose", false);
00076 
00077   if ((port = (uint16_t)props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.Master.Port", 0)) == 0) {
00078     HT_ERROR("Hypertable.Master.Port property not found in config file, exiting...");
00079     exit(1);
00080   }
00081 
00082   m_max_range_bytes = props_ptr->get_int64("Hypertable.RangeServer.Range.MaxBytes", 200000000LL);
00083 
00087   dfs_client = new DfsBroker::Client(conn_mgr, props_ptr);
00088 
00089   if (m_verbose) {
00090     cout << "DfsBroker.Host=" << props_ptr->get("DfsBroker.Host", "") << endl;
00091     cout << "DfsBroker.Port=" << props_ptr->get("DfsBroker.Port", "") << endl;
00092     cout << "DfsBroker.Timeout=" << props_ptr->get("DfsBroker.Timeout", "") << endl;
00093   }
00094 
00095   if (!dfs_client->wait_for_connection(30)) {
00096     HT_ERROR("Unable to connect to DFS Broker, exiting...");
00097     exit(1);
00098   }
00099 
00100   m_dfs_client = dfs_client;
00101 
00102   atomic_set(&m_last_table_id, 0);
00103 
00104   if (!initialize())
00105     exit(1);
00106 
00107   /* Read Last Table ID */
00108   {
00109     DynamicBuffer valbuf(0);
00110     HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00111     int ival;
00112     uint32_t lock_status;
00113     uint32_t oflags = OPEN_FLAG_READ | OPEN_FLAG_WRITE | OPEN_FLAG_LOCK;
00114 
00115     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/master", oflags, null_handle_callback, &m_master_file_handle)) != Error::OK) {
00116       HT_ERRORF("Unable to open Hyperspace file '/hypertable/master' (%s)  Try re-running with --initialize",
00117                    Error::get_text(error));
00118       exit(1);
00119     }
00120 
00121     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock(m_master_file_handle, LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, &lock_status, &m_master_file_sequencer)) != Error::OK) {
00122       HT_ERRORF("Problem obtaining exclusive lock on master Hyperspace file '/hypertable/master' - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00123       exit(1);
00124     }
00125 
00126     if (lock_status != LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00127       HT_ERROR("Unable to obtain lock on '/hypertable/master' - conflict");
00128       exit(1);
00129     }
00130 
00131     // Write master location in 'address' attribute, format is IP:port
00132     {
00133       String host_str, addr_str;
00134       struct hostent *he;
00135       InetAddr::get_hostname(host_str);
00136       if ((he = gethostbyname(host_str.c_str())) == 0) {
00137         HT_ERRORF("Problem obtaining address for hostname '%s'", host_str.c_str());
00138         exit(1);
00139       }
00140       addr_str = String(inet_ntoa(*(struct in_addr *)*he->h_addr_list)) + ":" + (int)port;
00141       if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(m_master_file_handle, "address", addr_str.c_str(), strlen(addr_str.c_str()))) != Error::OK) {
00142         HT_ERRORF("Problem setting attribute 'address' of hyperspace file /hypertable/master - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00143         exit(1);
00144       }
00145     }
00146 
00147     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(m_master_file_handle, "last_table_id", valbuf)) != Error::OK) {
00148       if (error == Error::HYPERSPACE_ATTR_NOT_FOUND) {
00149         uint32_t table_id = 0;
00150         if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(m_master_file_handle, "last_table_id", &table_id, sizeof(int32_t))) != Error::OK) {
00151           HT_ERRORF("Problem setting attribute 'last_table_id' of file /hypertable/master - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00152           exit(1);
00153         }
00154         ival = 0;
00155       }
00156       else {
00157         HT_ERRORF("Problem getting attribute 'last_table_id' from file /hypertable/master - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00158         exit(1);
00159       }
00160     }
00161     else {
00162       assert(valbuf.fill() == sizeof(int32_t));
00163       memcpy(&ival, valbuf.base, sizeof(int32_t));
00164     }
00165 
00166     atomic_set(&m_last_table_id, ival);
00167     if (m_verbose)
00168       cout << "Last Table ID: " << ival << endl;
00169   }
00170 
00174   scan_servers_directory();
00175 
00176   master_gc_start(props_ptr, m_threads, m_metadata_table_ptr, m_dfs_client);
00177 }

00200 void Master::server_left(const String &location) {
00201   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00202   int error;
00203   uint32_t lock_status;
00204   LockSequencer lock_sequencer;
00205   ServerMap::iterator iter = m_server_map.find(location);
00206   String hsfname = (String)"/hypertable/servers/" + location;
00207 
00208   if (iter == m_server_map.end()) {
00209     HT_WARNF("Server (%s) not found in map", location.c_str());
00210     return;
00211   }
00212 
00213   // if we're about to delete the item pointing to the server map iterator, then advance the iterator
00214   if (iter == m_server_map_iter)
00215     m_server_map_iter++;
00216 
00217   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock((*iter).second->hyperspace_handle, LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, &lock_status, &lock_sequencer)) != Error::OK) {
00218     HT_ERRORF("Problem obtaining exclusive lock on master Hyperspace file '/hypertable/master' - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00219     return;
00220   }
00221 
00222   if (lock_status != LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00223     HT_INFOF("Unable to obtain lock on server file %s, ignoring...", location.c_str());
00224     return;
00225   }
00226 
00227   m_hyperspace_ptr->unlink(hsfname);
00228   m_hyperspace_ptr->close((*iter).second->hyperspace_handle);
00229   m_server_map.erase(iter);
00230   if (m_server_map.empty())
00231     m_no_servers_cond.notify_all();
00232 
00233   HT_INFOF("RangeServer lost it's lock on file %s, deleting ...", hsfname.c_str());
00234   cout << flush;
00235 
00239 }

00254 
00255   if ((error = create_table(tablename, schemastr, errmsg)) != Error::OK)
00256     cb->error(error, errmsg);
00257   else
00258     cb->response_ok();

00265 void Master::get_schema(ResponseCallbackGetSchema *cb, const char *tablename) {
00266   int error = Error::OK;
00267   String tablefile = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + tablename;
00268   String errmsg;
00269   DynamicBuffer schemabuf(0);
00270   uint64_t handle;
00271   bool exists;
00272   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00273 
00277   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->exists(tablefile, &exists)) != Error::OK) {
00278     errmsg = (String)"Problem checking for existence of table '" + tablename + "' - " + Error::get_text(error);
00279     goto abort;
00280   }
00281 
00285   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(tablefile, OPEN_FLAG_READ, null_handle_callback, &handle)) != Error::OK) {
00286     errmsg = "Unable to open Hyperspace table file '" + tablefile + "' (" + Error::get_text(error) + ")";
00287     goto abort;
00288   }
00289 
00293   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "schema", schemabuf)) != Error::OK) {
00294     errmsg = "Problem getting attribute 'schema' for table file '" + tablefile + "'";
00295     goto abort;
00296   }
00297 
00298   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00299 
00300   cb->response((char *)schemabuf.base);
00301 
00302   if (m_verbose) {
00303     HT_INFOF("Successfully fetched schema (length=%d) for table '%s'", strlen((char *)schemabuf.base), tablename);
00304   }
00305 
00306  abort:
00307   if (error != Error::OK) {
00308     if (m_verbose) {
00309       HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", Error::get_text(error), errmsg.c_str());
00310     }
00311     cb->error(error, errmsg);
00312   }
00313   return;
00314 }

00321 void Master::register_server(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *location, struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00322   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00323   int error;
00324   RangeServerStatePtr rs_state;
00325   ServerMap::iterator iter;
00326   struct sockaddr_in alias;
00327   uint32_t oflags = OPEN_FLAG_READ | OPEN_FLAG_WRITE | OPEN_FLAG_LOCK;
00328   HandleCallbackPtr lock_file_handler;
00329   uint32_t lock_status;
00330   LockSequencer lock_sequencer;
00331   String hsfname;
00332 
00333   HT_EXPECT((iter = m_server_map.find(location)) == m_server_map.end(), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00334 
00335   rs_state = new RangeServerState();
00336   rs_state->location = location;
00337   rs_state->addr = addr;
00338 
00339   if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(location, alias)) {
00340     HT_ERRORF("Problem creating address from location '%s'", location);
00341     cb->error(Error::INVALID_METADATA, (String)"Unable to convert location '" + location + "' to address");
00342     return;
00343   }
00344   else {
00345     Comm *comm = m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm();
00346     comm->set_alias(addr, alias);
00347   }
00348 
00349   hsfname = (String)"/hypertable/servers/" + location;
00350 
00351   lock_file_handler = new ServerLockFileHandler(rs_state, this, m_app_queue_ptr);
00352 
00353   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(hsfname, oflags, lock_file_handler, &rs_state->hyperspace_handle)) != Error::OK) {
00354     HT_ERRORF("Problem opening discovered server file %s - %s", hsfname.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00355     cb->error(error, (String)"Problem opening discovered server file '" + hsfname + "'");
00356     return;
00357   }
00358 
00359   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock(rs_state->hyperspace_handle, LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, &lock_status, &lock_sequencer)) != Error::OK) {
00360     HT_ERRORF("Problem attempting to obtain exclusive lock on server Hyperspace file '%s' - %s",
00361                  hsfname.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00362     cb->error(error, (String)"Problem attempting to obtain exclusive lock on server Hyperspace file '" + hsfname + "'");
00363     return;
00364   }
00365 
00366   if (lock_status == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00367     HT_INFOF("Obtained lock on servers file %s, removing...", hsfname.c_str());
00368     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->unlink(hsfname)) != Error::OK)
00369       HT_INFOF("Problem deleting Hyperspace file %s", hsfname.c_str());
00370     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->close(rs_state->hyperspace_handle)) != Error::OK)
00371       HT_INFOF("Problem closing handle on deleting Hyperspace file %s", hsfname.c_str());
00372   }
00373   else
00374     m_server_map[rs_state->location] = rs_state;
00375 
00376   {
00377     String addr_str;
00378     HT_INFOF("Server Registered %s -> %s", location, InetAddr::string_format(addr_str, addr));
00379     cout << flush;
00380   }
00381 
00382   cb->response_ok();
00383 
00387   if (!m_initialized) {
00388     int error;
00389     TableIdentifier table;
00390     RangeSpec range;
00391     RangeServerClient rsc(m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30);
00392 
00396     {
00397       String errmsg;
00398       String metadata_schema_file = System::install_dir + "/conf/METADATA.xml";
00399       off_t schemalen;
00400       const char *schemastr = FileUtils::file_to_buffer(metadata_schema_file.c_str(), &schemalen);
00401 
00402       if ((error = create_table("METADATA", schemastr, errmsg)) != Error::OK) {
00403         if (error != Error::MASTER_TABLE_EXISTS) {
00404           HT_ERRORF("Problem creating METADATA table - %s, exiting...", Error::get_text(error));
00405           _exit(1);
00406         }
00407       }
00408     }
00409 
00413     m_metadata_table_ptr = new Table(m_props_ptr, m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), m_hyperspace_ptr, "METADATA");
00414 
00415     // If table exists, then ranges should already have been assigned
00416     if (error == Error::MASTER_TABLE_EXISTS) {
00417       m_initialized = true;
00418       return;
00419     }
00420 
00421     m_metadata_table_ptr->get_identifier(&table);
00422     table.name = "METADATA";
00423 
00427     range.start_row = 0;
00428     range.end_row = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00429 
00430     try {
00431       RangeState range_state;
00432       range_state.soft_limit = m_max_range_bytes;
00433       rsc.load_range(alias, table, range, 0, range_state, 0);
00434     }
00435     catch (Exception &e) {
00436       String addr_str;
00437       HT_ERRORF("Problem issuing 'load range' command for %s[..%s] at server %s - %s",
00438                 table.name, range.end_row, InetAddr::string_format(addr_str, alias), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00439     }
00440 
00441 
00446     TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00447     KeySpec key;
00448     String metadata_key_str;
00449 
00450     mutator_ptr = m_metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00451 
00452     metadata_key_str = String("0:") + Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00453     key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00454     key.row_len = metadata_key_str.length();
00455     key.column_qualifier = 0;
00456     key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00457 
00458     try {
00459       key.column_family = "StartRow";
00460       mutator_ptr->set(0, key, (uint8_t *)Key::END_ROOT_ROW, strlen(Key::END_ROOT_ROW));
00461       mutator_ptr->flush();
00462     }
00463     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00464       // TODO: propagate exception
00465       HT_ERRORF("METADATA update error (row_key = %s) - %s : %s", metadata_key_str.c_str(), e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00466       exit(1);
00467     }
00468 
00472     range.start_row = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00473     range.end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00474 
00475     try {
00476       RangeState range_state;
00477       range_state.soft_limit = m_max_range_bytes;
00478       rsc.load_range(alias, table, range, 0, range_state, 0);
00479     }
00480     catch (Exception &e) {
00481       String addr_str;
00482       HT_ERRORF("Problem issuing 'load range' command for %s[..%s] at server %s - %s",
00483                 table.name, range.end_row, InetAddr::string_format(addr_str, alias), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00484     }
00485 
00486     m_initialized = true;
00487   }
00488 
00489 }

00497 void Master::report_split(ResponseCallback *cb, TableIdentifier &table, RangeSpec &range, const char *transfer_log_dir, uint64_t soft_limit) {
00498   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00499   RangeServerClient rsc(m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30);
00500 
00501   HT_INFOF("Entering report_split for %s[%s:%s].", table.name, range.start_row, range.end_row);
00502 
00503   cb->response_ok();
00504 
00505   {
00506     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00507     if (m_server_map_iter == m_server_map.end())
00508       m_server_map_iter = m_server_map.begin();
00509     assert(m_server_map_iter != m_server_map.end());
00510     memcpy(&addr, &((*m_server_map_iter).second->addr), sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00511     HT_INFOF("Assigning newly reported range %s[%s:%s] to %s", table.name, range.start_row, range.end_row, (*m_server_map_iter).first.c_str());
00512     m_server_map_iter++;
00513   }
00514 
00515   //cb->get_address(addr);
00516 
00517   try {
00518     RangeState range_state;
00519     range_state.soft_limit = soft_limit;
00520     rsc.load_range(addr, table, range, transfer_log_dir, range_state, 0);
00521     HT_INFOF("report_split for %s[%s:%s] successful.", table.name, range.start_row, range.end_row);
00522   }
00523   catch (Exception &e) {
00524     String addr_str;
00525     HT_ERRORF("Problem issuing 'load range' command for %s[%s:%s] at server %s - %s",
00526               table.name, range.start_row, range.end_row, InetAddr::string_format(addr_str, addr), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00527   }
00528 
00529 }
00530 
00531 void Master::drop_table(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *table_name, bool if_exists) {
00532   int error = Error::OK;
00533   int saved_error = Error::OK;
00534   String err_msg;
00535   String table_file = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + table_name;
00536   DynamicBuffer value_buf(0);
00537   int ival;
00538   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00539   uint64_t handle;
00540   String table_name_str = table_name;
00541 
00542   HT_INFOF("Entering drop_table for %s", table_name);
00543   std::cout << flush;
00544 
00548   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(table_file.c_str(), OPEN_FLAG_READ, null_handle_callback, &handle)) != Error::OK) {
00549     if (if_exists && error == Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME)
00550       cb->response_ok();
00551     else
00552       cb->error(error, (String)"Problem opening file '" + table_file + "'");
00553     return;
00554   }
00555 
00559   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "table_id", value_buf)) != Error::OK) {
00560     HT_ERRORF("Problem getting attribute 'table_id' from file '%s' - %s", table_file.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00561     cb->error(error, (String)"Problem reading attribute 'table_id' from file '" + table_file + "'");
00562     return;
00563   }
00564 
00568   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle)) != Error::OK) {
00569     HT_ERRORF("Problem closing hyperspace handle %lld - %s", (long long int)handle, Error::get_text(error));
00570   }
00571 
00572   assert(value_buf.fill() == sizeof(int32_t));
00573 
00574   memcpy(&ival, value_buf.base, sizeof(int32_t));
00575 
00576   {
00577     char start_row[16];
00578     char end_row[16];
00579     TableScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00580     ScanSpec scan_spec;
00581     Cell cell;
00582     String location_str;
00583     std::set<String> unique_locations;
00584     TableIdentifier table;
00585     RowInterval ri;
00586 
00587     table.name = table_name_str.c_str();
00588     table.id = ival;
00589     table.generation = 0;
00590 
00591     sprintf(start_row, "%d:", ival);
00592     sprintf(end_row, "%d:%s", ival, Key::END_ROW_MARKER);
00593 
00594     scan_spec.row_limit = 0;
00595     scan_spec.max_versions = 1;
00596     scan_spec.columns.clear();
00597     scan_spec.columns.push_back("Location");
00598 
00599     ri.start = start_row;
00600     ri.end = end_row;
00601     scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00602 
00603     scan_spec.time_interval.first = 0;
00604     scan_spec.time_interval.second = 0;
00605 
00606     int max_wait=5;
00607 
00608     while (!m_metadata_table_ptr && max_wait) {
00609       poll(0, 0, 1000);
00610       max_wait--;
00611     }
00612 
00613     if (!m_metadata_table_ptr) {
00614       HT_ERROR("Aborting DropTable because no RangeServers have registered");
00615       cb->error(Error::MASTER_NO_RANGESERVERS, "");
00616       return;
00617     }
00618       
00619     scanner_ptr = m_metadata_table_ptr->create_scanner(scan_spec);
00620 
00621     while (scanner_ptr->next(cell)) {
00622       location_str = String((const char *)cell.value, cell.value_len);
00623       boost::trim(location_str);
00624       if (location_str != "" && location_str != "!")
00625         unique_locations.insert(location_str);
00626     }
00627 
00628     if (!unique_locations.empty()) {
00629       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00630       DropTableDispatchHandler sync_handler(table, m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30);
00631       RangeServerStatePtr state_ptr;
00632       ServerMap::iterator iter;
00633 
00634       for (std::set<String>::iterator loc_iter = unique_locations.begin(); loc_iter != unique_locations.end(); loc_iter++) {
00635         if ((iter = m_server_map.find(*loc_iter)) != m_server_map.end()) {
00636           sync_handler.add((*iter).second->addr);
00637         }
00638         else {
00639           saved_error = Error::RANGESERVER_UNAVAILABLE;
00640           err_msg = *loc_iter;
00641         }
00642       }
00643 
00644       if (!sync_handler.wait_for_completion()) {
00645         std::vector<DropTableDispatchHandler::ErrorResult> errors;
00646         sync_handler.get_errors(errors);
00647         for (size_t i=0; i<errors.size(); i++) {
00648           HT_WARNF("drop table error - %s - %s", errors[i].msg.c_str(), Error::get_text(errors[i].error));
00649         }
00650         cb->error(errors[0].error, errors[0].msg);
00651         return;
00652       }
00653     }
00654 
00655   }
00656 
00657   if (saved_error != Error::OK) {
00658     HT_ERRORF("DROP TABLE failed '%s' - %s", err_msg.c_str(), Error::get_text(saved_error));
00659     cb->error(saved_error, err_msg);
00660     return;
00661   }
00662   else if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->unlink(table_file.c_str())) != Error::OK) {
00663     HT_ERRORF("Problem removing hyperspace file - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00664     cb->error(error, (String)"Problem removing file '" + table_file + "'");
00665     return;
00666   }
00667 
00668   HT_INFOF("DROP TABLE '%s' id=%d success", table_name_str.c_str(), ival);
00669   cb->response_ok();
00670   cout << flush;
00671 }
00672 
00673   void Master::shutdown(ResponseCallback *cb) {
00674     RangeServerClient rsc(m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30);
00675 
00676     HT_INFO("SHUTDOWN");
00677     std::cout << endl;
00678 
00679     {
00680       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00681       boost::xtime expire_time;
00682 
00683       // issue shutdown commands
00684       for (ServerMap::iterator iter = m_server_map.begin(); iter != m_server_map.end(); iter++)
00685         rsc.shutdown((*iter).second->addr);
00686 
00687       boost::xtime_get(&expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00688       expire_time.sec += (int64_t)30;
00689 
00690       m_no_servers_cond.timed_wait(lock, expire_time);
00691       if (!m_server_map.empty()) {
00692         String err_msg = format("%d RangeServers failed to shutdown", (int)m_server_map.size());
00693         cb->error(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, err_msg);
00694         return;
00695       }
00696 
00697       m_hyperspace_ptr = 0;
00698     }
00699 
00700     cb->response_ok();
00701 
00702     poll(0, 0, 1000);
00703 
00704     _exit(0);
00705 
00706   }
00707 
00708 
00709 int
00710 Master::create_table(const char *tablename, const char *schemastr,
00711                      String &errmsg) {
00712   int error = Error::OK;
00713   String finalschema = "";
00714   String tablefile = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + tablename;
00715   string table_basedir;
00716   string agdir;
00717   Schema *schema = 0;
00718   list<Schema::AccessGroup *> *aglist;
00719   bool exists;
00720   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00721   uint64_t handle;
00722   uint32_t table_id;
00723 
00724   m_hyperspace_ptr->set_silent_flag(true);
00725 
00729   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->exists(tablefile, &exists)) != Error::OK) {
00730     errmsg = (String)"Problem checking for existence of table file '" + tablefile + "'";
00731     goto abort;
00732   }
00733   if (exists) {
00734     errmsg = tablename;
00735     error = Error::MASTER_TABLE_EXISTS;
00736     goto abort;
00737   }
00738 
00742   schema = Schema::new_instance(schemastr, strlen(schemastr));
00743   if (!schema->is_valid()) {
00744     errmsg = schema->get_error_string();
00745     error = Error::MASTER_BAD_SCHEMA;
00746     goto abort;
00747   }
00748   schema->assign_ids();
00749   schema->render(finalschema);
00750 
00754   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(tablefile, OPEN_FLAG_READ|OPEN_FLAG_WRITE|OPEN_FLAG_CREATE, null_handle_callback, &handle)) != Error::OK) {
00755     errmsg = "Unable to create Hyperspace table file '" + tablefile + "'";
00756     goto abort;
00757   }
00758 
00762   {
00763     if (!strcmp(tablename, "METADATA"))
00764       table_id = 0;
00765     else {
00766       table_id = (uint32_t)atomic_inc_return(&m_last_table_id);
00767       if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(m_master_file_handle, "last_table_id", &table_id, sizeof(int32_t))) != Error::OK) {
00768         errmsg = (String)"Problem setting attribute 'last_table_id' of file /hypertable/master - " + Error::get_text(error);
00769         goto abort;
00770       }
00771     }
00772 
00773     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(handle, "table_id", &table_id, sizeof(int32_t))) != Error::OK) {
00774       errmsg = (String)"Problem setting attribute 'table_id' of file " + tablefile + " - " + Error::get_text(error);
00775       goto abort;
00776     }
00777   }
00778 
00779 
00783   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(handle, "schema", finalschema.c_str(), strlen(finalschema.c_str()))) != Error::OK) {
00784     errmsg = (String)"Problem creating attribute 'schema' for table file '" + tablefile + "'";
00785     goto abort;
00786   }
00787 
00788   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00789 
00793   table_basedir = (string)"/hypertable/tables/" + tablename + "/";
00794   aglist = schema->get_access_group_list();
00795 
00796   for (list<Schema::AccessGroup *>::iterator ag_it = aglist->begin();
00797       ag_it != aglist->end(); ag_it++) {
00798     agdir = table_basedir + (*ag_it)->name;
00799     m_dfs_client->mkdirs(agdir);
00800   }
00801 
00805   if (table_id != 0) {
00806     TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00807     KeySpec key;
00808     String metadata_key_str;
00809     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00810     int max_wait=5;
00811 
00812     while (!m_metadata_table_ptr && max_wait) {
00813       poll(0, 0, 1000);
00814       max_wait--;
00815     }
00816 
00817     if (!m_metadata_table_ptr) {
00818       HT_ERROR("Aborting DropTable because no RangeServers have registered");
00819       return Error::MASTER_NO_RANGESERVERS;
00820     }
00821 
00822     mutator_ptr = m_metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00823 
00824     metadata_key_str = String("") + table_id + ":" + Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00825     key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00826     key.row_len = metadata_key_str.length();
00827     key.column_qualifier = 0;
00828     key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00829 
00830     try {
00831       key.column_family = "StartRow";
00832       mutator_ptr->set(0, key, 0, 0);
00833       mutator_ptr->flush();
00834     }
00835     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00836       errmsg = (String)"Problem updating METADATA with new table info (row key = " + metadata_key_str.c_str() + ") - " + e.what();
00837       goto abort;
00838     }
00839 
00844     TableIdentifier table;
00845     RangeSpec range;
00846     uint64_t soft_limit;
00847     RangeServerClient rsc(m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30);
00848 
00849     table.name = tablename;
00850     table.id = table_id;
00851     table.generation = schema->get_generation();
00852 
00853     range.start_row = 0;
00854     range.end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00855 
00856     {
00857       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00858       if (m_server_map_iter == m_server_map.end())
00859         m_server_map_iter = m_server_map.begin();
00860       assert(m_server_map_iter != m_server_map.end());
00861       memcpy(&addr, &((*m_server_map_iter).second->addr), sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00862       HT_INFOF("Assigning first range %s[%s:%s] to %s", table.name, range.start_row, range.end_row, (*m_server_map_iter).first.c_str());
00863       m_server_map_iter++;
00864       soft_limit = m_max_range_bytes / std::min(64, (int)m_server_map.size()*2);
00865     }
00866 
00867     try {
00868       RangeState range_state;
00869       range_state.soft_limit = soft_limit;
00870       rsc.load_range(addr, table, range, 0, range_state);
00871     }
00872     catch (Exception &e) {
00873       String addr_str;
00874       HT_ERRORF("Problem issuing 'load range' command for %s[..%s] at server %s - %s",
00875                 table.name, range.end_row, InetAddr::string_format(addr_str, addr), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00876     }
00877   }
00878 
00879   if (m_verbose) {
00880     HT_INFOF("Successfully created table '%s' ID=%d", tablename, table_id);
00881   }
00882 
00883 abort:
00884   m_hyperspace_ptr->set_silent_flag(false);
00885   delete schema;
00886   if (error != Error::OK) {
00887     if (m_verbose) {
00888       HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", Error::get_text(error), errmsg.c_str());
00889     }
00890   }
00891   return error;
00892 }
00893 
00894 
00899 bool Master::initialize() {
00900   int error;
00901   bool exists;
00902   uint64_t handle;
00903   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00904 
00905   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->exists("/hypertable/master", &exists)) == Error::OK && exists &&
00906       (error = m_hyperspace_ptr->exists("/hypertable/servers", &exists)) == Error::OK && exists)
00907     return true;
00908 
00909   if (!create_hyperspace_dir("/hypertable"))
00910     return false;
00911 
00912   if (!create_hyperspace_dir("/hypertable/servers"))
00913     return false;
00914 
00915   if (!create_hyperspace_dir("/hypertable/tables"))
00916     return false;
00917 
00921   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/master", OPEN_FLAG_READ|OPEN_FLAG_WRITE|OPEN_FLAG_CREATE, null_handle_callback, &handle)) != Error::OK) {
00922     HT_ERRORF("Unable to open Hyperspace file '/hypertable/master' (%s)", Error::get_text(error));
00923     return false;
00924   }
00925   m_master_file_handle = handle;
00926 
00930   uint32_t table_id = 0;
00931   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(m_master_file_handle, "last_table_id", &table_id, sizeof(int32_t))) != Error::OK) {
00932     HT_ERRORF("Problem setting attribute 'last_table_id' of file /hypertable/master - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00933     return false;
00934   }
00935 
00936   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00937   m_master_file_handle = 0;
00938 
00942   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/root", OPEN_FLAG_READ|OPEN_FLAG_WRITE|OPEN_FLAG_CREATE, null_handle_callback, &handle)) != Error::OK) {
00943     HT_ERRORF("Unable to open Hyperspace file '/hypertable/root' (%s)", Error::get_text(error));
00944     return false;
00945   }
00946   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00947 
00948   HT_INFO("Successfully Initialized Hypertable.");
00949 
00950   return true;
00951 }
00952 
00953 
00957 void Master::scan_servers_directory() {
00958   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00959   int error;
00960   HandleCallbackPtr lock_file_handler;
00961   std::vector<struct DirEntry> listing;
00962   uint32_t lock_status;
00963   LockSequencer lock_sequencer;
00964   RangeServerStatePtr rs_state;
00965   uint32_t oflags;
00966   String hsfname;
00967 
00971   m_servers_dir_callback_ptr = new ServersDirectoryHandler(this, m_app_queue_ptr);
00972 
00973   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/servers", OPEN_FLAG_READ, m_servers_dir_callback_ptr, &m_servers_dir_handle)) != Error::OK) {
00974     HT_ERRORF("Unable to open Hyperspace directory '/hypertable/servers' (%s)  Try re-running with --initialize",
00975                  Error::get_text(error));
00976     exit(1);
00977   }
00978 
00979   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->readdir(m_servers_dir_handle, listing)) != Error::OK) {
00980     HT_ERRORF("Problem scanning Hyperspace directory '/hypertable/servers' - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00981     exit(1);
00982   }
00983 
00984   oflags = OPEN_FLAG_READ | OPEN_FLAG_WRITE | OPEN_FLAG_LOCK;
00985 
00986   for (size_t i=0; i<listing.size(); i++) {
00987 
00988     rs_state = new RangeServerState();
00989     rs_state->location = listing[i].name;
00990 
00991     hsfname = (String)"/hypertable/servers/" + listing[i].name;
00992 
00993     lock_file_handler = new ServerLockFileHandler(rs_state, this, m_app_queue_ptr);
00994 
00995     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(hsfname, oflags, lock_file_handler, &rs_state->hyperspace_handle)) != Error::OK) {
00996       HT_ERRORF("Problem opening discovered server file %s - %s", hsfname.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00997       continue;
00998     }
00999 
01000     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock(rs_state->hyperspace_handle, LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, &lock_status, &lock_sequencer)) != Error::OK) {
01001       HT_ERRORF("Problem obtaining exclusive lock on master Hyperspace file '/hypertable/master' - %s", Error::get_text(error));
01002       continue;
01003     }
01004 
01005     if (lock_status == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
01006       HT_INFOF("Obtained lock on servers file %s, removing...", hsfname.c_str());
01007       if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->unlink(hsfname)) != Error::OK)
01008         HT_INFOF("Problem deleting Hyperspace file %s", hsfname.c_str());
01009       if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->close(rs_state->hyperspace_handle)) != Error::OK)
01010         HT_INFOF("Problem closing handle on deleting Hyperspace file %s", hsfname.c_str());
01011     }
01012     else {
01013       m_server_map[rs_state->location] = rs_state;
01014     }
01015   }
01016 
01017 }
01018 
01019 
01023 bool Master::create_hyperspace_dir(const String &dir) {
01024   int error;
01025   bool exists;
01026 
01030   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->exists(dir, &exists)) != Error::OK) {
01031     HT_ERRORF("Problem checking for existence of directory '%s' - %s", dir.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
01032     return false;
01033   }
01034 
01035   if (exists)
01036     return true;
01037 
01038   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->mkdir(dir)) != Error::OK) {
01039     HT_ERRORF("Problem creating directory '%s' - %s", dir.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
01040     return false;
01041   }
01042 
01043   return true;
01044 }
01045 
01046 void Master::join() {
01047   m_app_queue_ptr->join();
01048   m_threads.join_all();
01049 }
